english.segment1: I'm as eloquent as an elephant. I'm as headstrong as the Mighty King Kong. On a rampage throwing airplanes. I can't believe You haven't gone away. Gone away
english.segment2: I am difficult, argumentative. I'm as thick-skulled as the dinosaur bones on a display in a glass case. I can't believe You haven't run away. Run away
english.segment3: It must be different through Your eyes. Because You look at me like it's the first time. That You've ever seen my face
english.segment4: I'm preoccupied with a crowded mind. I get off track like a train rolling back to the future. Never too sure who'll be here when I come back around. But I'm finding out.
